data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Saint-Pierre.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint-Pierre, Martinique
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 5,492 lost in Saint-Pierre that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Saint-Pierre.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Saint-Pierre, Martinique to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Le Morne-Rouge
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Le Morne-Rouge, Saint-Pierre, Martinique.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 5,900 souls in Saint-Pierre and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Saint-Pierre, Martinique need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint-Pierre, Martinique has a population of 5,900.

We estimate Saint-Pierre has 407 people who might know Jesus, 5,189 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 303 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 14 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Saint-Pierre, Martinique to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.
